user_stories.title: User can log in with valid credentials
user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in with my credentials so that I can access my personalized dashboard
user_stories.description: As a registered_user, I want User can log in with valid credentials so that I can achieve my objectives
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the login page, When I enter my valid email and password and click login, Then I am redirected to my dashboard
Given I am logged in, When I access protected pages, Then I can view content without being prompted to log in again
Given I am on the login page, When I enter my valid credentials, Then my session is securely established

user_stories.title: System rejects invalid login credentials
user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want the system to reject invalid credentials so that my account remains secure
user_stories.description: As a registered_user, I want System rejects invalid login credentials so that I can achieve my objectives
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the login page, When I enter an incorrect email or password and click login, Then I see an error message 'Invalid email or password'
Given I am on the login page, When I attempt to log in with invalid credentials multiple times, Then I am temporarily locked out after 5 failed attempts
Given I am locked out due to failed attempts, When I try to log in again, Then I see a message indicating temporary lockout and instructions to reset password
dependencies: User can log in with valid credentials

tasks.title: Design Login Form UI Component
tasks.description: Create a responsive login form UI using React with input fields for email and password, including labels, placeholders, and a submit button. Ensure the design follows accessibility guidelines (WCAG 2.1) with proper ARIA attributes.
acceptance_criteria: Form includes email and password input fields with labels
Form is responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop
ARIA attributes are added for screen readers
technical_notes: Use React hooks for state management
Implement CSS-in-JS or styled-components for styling

tasks.title: Implement Client-Side Form Validation
tasks.description: Add validation logic for email format (using regex) and password requirements (minimum 8 characters, at least one number and one special character) with real-time feedback to the user.
acceptance_criteria: Email input validates correct format (e.g., user@domain.com)
Validation errors are displayed in real-time below respective fields
Submit button is disabled until form is valid
technical_notes: Use library like Formik or React Hook Form for validation
Display error messages with clear styling
